headline.print_headline: Kraft Challenged by 'Healthier' Macaroni and Cheese Brands
headline.main: Kraft Challenged by 'Healthier' Macaroni and Cheese Brands

docs.lead_paragraph: Kraft Macaroni & Cheese has been a favorite meal for generations of American children, but smaller brands made with more natural ingredients are starting to nibble at its market share, part of a trend that is biting into growth at large U.S. food companies.
